content: 1. Open the menu > New Account > Email
creator: MattAuSupport

content: Is the outgoing server set to smtp.office365.com once it is all you need to do is restart Thunderbird to see the authentication method you need.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: Then you will need to export them (Right click the address book in the list), I suggest as an LDIF file and attach that to an email.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: There are the same settings on a per account basis in account settings.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: Yes Matt I am fully aware of that! I does not matter whether I use per account basis in individual account settings or use Global settings. Return Receipts are still not being sent
creator: Jancux

content: Klik op de map die het probleem heeft en selecteer 'eigenschappen' => 'map repareren'. Dit zou het moeten oplossen
creator: Mad_Maks

content: Als je een kopie verplaats naar de nieuwe laptop blijven de gegegevens staan op de oude en kan je daar ook gewoon thunderbird blijven gebruiken. kijk wel of je IMAP of POP gebruikt want dat geeft wel een verschil, zie https://support.mozilla.org/nl/kb/het-verschil-tussen-imap-en-pop3
creator: Mad_Maks

content: Puoi recuperare facilmente il contenuti di Cartelle locali solo se hai un backup. Cosa succede quando sposti una mail in Cartelle locali dipende anzitutto da tipo di account (POP3 o IMAP) e poi dalle impostazioni che hai adottato per quell'account.
creator: @next
